column4: does anyone have any suggestions of some drivers I might need to download? I'm trying to view youtube and certain vids will load while others will not. any ideas why this may be? I'm running 9.04 and mozilla 3.0
flash
I have flash. The most recent plugin from what I can tell
you probably want to get linux flash 10
ahhh....  that could be it!  thanks!
did you download and install it from directions on a site, or just from the ubuntu repositories with apt-get?
I downloaded the adobe verision
disregard, that link will take care of you
vigo, unfortunately, it says I already have it installed.   =\
vigo, Like I said, some vids work, others don't... it's the wierdest thing...
are you using 64bit or 32bit ubuntu?
so you did sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree ?
vigo, this is a very fresh install, so not many plug-ins installed at all. I pastebin'd my About Plugins here:   http://pastebin.com/d494ac875
I did it through adobe's website.
here's a forum thread with a suggestion: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1193567&highlight=FOT004
thank you!
That did it!  Thank you! The tutorial that he gave worked perfect for deleting the plugins and reinstalling.
yeah, I had to do something like that to get things working on 64bit as well
awesome, well thanks again... now I just need to work on getting my javascripts to run more smooth.
try firefox 3.5, aka Shiretoko, supposedly it does javascript better
I'll give it a try here in a bit... if I can get 3.0 to work, I think I'd prefer that for support purposes
df -ah not work?
THAT worked... thanks!!
